Learning To Wait and Be Patient

October 3, 2021 ~ Devotionals ~ Written by Wren Sparrow

Why is patience important? what does the Bible say about it? and a little bit about my experience with practicing patience. We don’t like long lines. We hate traffic. We just hate waiting for things. I remember there was one statistic that said most people would leave a website if it took over 5 seconds to load. Let’s face it, we’re spoiled rotten in this country.
